meanings.definition: A type of traditional Egyptian sailing boat.
meanings.sent1: The dahabiya gracefully sailed on the river.
meanings.sent2: Tourists enjoyed a peaceful ride on the dahabiya.
meanings.sent3: The dahabiya seemed to dance on the water with its elegant sail.
meanings.sent4: The dahabiya glided through the waves like a golden swan.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the dahabiya against the sunset was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: A boat used for transportation or leisure on the Nile River.
meanings.sent1: Families traveled together on the dahabiya.
meanings.sent2: The dahabiya provided a relaxing journey along the Nile.
meanings.sent3: The dahabiya became a floating picnic spot for the day.
meanings.sent4: In the distance, the dahabiya looked like a moving house on water.
meanings.sent5: The colorful dahabiya added life to the calm river scene.

meanings.definition: A historical vessel with a distinctive design and sail configuration.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a model of the ancient dahabiya.
meanings.sent2: Scholars studied the unique features of the dahabiya.
meanings.sent3: Legend has it that the dahabiya was once crewed by ghosts!
meanings.sent4: The dahabiya stood out among the other ships like a rare gem.
meanings.sent5: The intricate carvings on the dahabiya told stories of the past.
